# Lembaran
> Brankas Aksara Personal yang Berdikari (v2.6.0)

## Core Workspaces
- [packages/core]: Shared logic, encryption (AES-GCM/Argon2id), and storage adapters.
- [packages/cli]: Interactive terminal interface (TUI) and puitis commands.
- [packages/web]: Next.js application (Landing page at / and Dashboard at /arsip).

## Key Files
- [packages/core/src/Arsip.ts]: High-level encryption and storage manager.
- [packages/core/src/Brankas.ts]: Cryptographic engine.
- [packages/cli/src/main.ts]: CLI entry point.
- [packages/web/app/page.tsx]: Premium landing page.
- [packages/web/app/arsip/page.tsx]: Main application dashboard.

## Documentation
- [CHANGELOG.md]: History of changes (Latest: v2.6.0).
- [docs/walkthrough.md]: Monorepo architecture & features overview.
- [AGENTS.md]: Development guidelines and core principles.

## Key Concepts
- Berdikari: Local-first data sovereignty.
- Sentinel Security: Client-side encryption.
- Monorepo: Unified workspace for Core, CLI, and Web.
